item.title: macOS Internals
item.description: - This post provides a chronological evolution of Mac OS X to Swift to help understand Mac and iPhone better.

item.title: Walkout at global science journal over 'unethical' fees
item.description: - Over 40 leading scientists have resigned from the editorial board of a top science journal due to what they describe as the "greed" of academic publisher Elsevier's publication charges, which they consider unethical.

item.title: I'm never investing in Google's smart home ecosystem again
item.description: - The author of the post is done with Google's smart home ecosystem due to their directionless approach towards their product line.

item.title: Pixel phones are sold with bootloader unlocking disabled
item.description: - Google Pixel phones come with bootloader unlocking disabled, and customers must connect the device to the internet to enable unlocking, causing inconvenience.

item.title: Belgium legalises ethical hacking
item.description: - Belgium has legalised 'ethical hacking' under a new whistleblower law, which allows the investigation of organisations for potential cybersecurity vulnerabilities without their consent.

item.title: The Prime Video microservices to monolith story
item.description: - The Prime Video team scaled up their audio/video monitoring service and reduced costs by 90%, with a combination of serverless and container solutions.

item.title: EU sends Apple stark warning over USB-C charging on new iPhones
item.description: - From 2024, all new technology products sold in EU countries must include universal USB-C charging ports as per EU's regulation.

item.title: Burnout
item.description: - The author discusses experiencing burnout, which is when someone becomes mentally, emotionally, and physically exhausted due to stress and overwork.

item.title: Nintendo reportedly issues DMCA takedown for Switch homebrew projects
item.description: - Nintendo issues DMCA takedown notice for Lockpick, a homebrew tool that allows users to dump unique keys from their Nintendo Switch console, required for numerous Switch hacking-related programs, including Switch emulators.

item.title: Contrast Rebellion
item.description: - Low-contrast font colors can make website content unreadable for many users, causing headaches and difficulties in reading.
